context: I made a costly mistake at work
letters:
Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to sincerely apologize for the mistake I made regarding [specific situation or error]. I fully recognize the implications of my actions and the impact they had on our team and the company's operations.

I deeply regret the oversight and want to assure you that it was not my intention to cause any disruption. I take full responsibility for the error and am committed to learning from this experience to prevent it from happening again in the future.

Please know that I value the trust you place in me and the opportunities I have to contribute to our goals. I am already working on a plan to address the situation and ensure that similar mistakes are avoided. I appreciate your understanding and support as I navigate this process.

Thank you for your patience and guidance. I am dedicated to making this right and continuing to improve in my role.

Sincerely,  
[Your Name]
